I have a sugeestion for the KSP store.

Make putting your address un-needed until you buy Physical items.(Such as Plushies.)

That is whats keeping me from buying KSP, my parents don\'t want to give out our address to companies.

I have tried that.

Here\'s what they think some guy is going to come to our house and rob us...

You do have SSL protection on your shopping server, right?

Then I can easily convince them the sites safe.

The shopping cart server is actually on PayPal\'s secure server. Honestly, you\'re more likely to have a thief get your address from your trash to rob you than some random person on the Internet that\'s probably no where near where you live. If your parents aren\'t able to grasp the concept of online business, I doubt there is much you can do to convince them otherwise.

Just earn yourself $20 (mow a lawn, help old ladies across the street for $1, whatever) and go to your local grocery/drug store and buy a pre-paid Visa/MC and buy the game.
